title: CISA adds critical vulnerability in ZetaCMS to KEV catalog
summary: CISA urges organizations to patch ZetaCMS 3.x due to a critical RCE allowing unauthenticated exploitation.

title: OpenSSL buffer overflow in BIO_new_mem_buf may lead to DoS
summary: A boundary condition in OpenSSL may trigger a denial-of-service. Exploitation requires crafted inputs.

title: Brute-force password spraying targeting SaaS tenants observed in US & KSA
summary: Multiple providers report credential attacks against SaaS tenants. Recommended actions include MFA enforcement and login throttling.

title: Malware campaign uses phishing lures to deploy remote code execution payloads
summary: Campaign targets European users using invoice-themed emails with malicious links. Behavior indicates possible command injection.

title: CISA adds critical vulnerability in ZetaCMS to KEV catalog
summary: Independent source echoes CISA advisory on critical ZetaCMS RCE.
